headline: APTIV HLDS LTD (APTV) Q4 Earnings: Taking a Look at Key Metrics Versus Estimates
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for APTIV HLDS LTD (APTV) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended December 2024, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: Aptiv PLC (APTV) Surpasses Q4 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: APTIV HLDS LTD (APTV) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 5.42% and 0.56%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Aptiv Reports Fourth Quarter 2024 Financial Results
summary: SCHAFFHAUSEN, Switzerland, February 06, 2025--Aptiv PLC (NYSE: APTV), a global technology company focused on making the world safer, greener and more connected, today reported fourth quarter 2024 U.S. GAAP earnings of $1.14 per diluted share. Excluding special items, fourth quarter earnings totaled $1.75 per diluted share.

raw.headline: Aptiv Reports Fourth Quarter 2024 Financial Results
raw.summary: SCHAFFHAUSEN, Switzerland, February 06, 2025--Aptiv PLC (NYSE: APTV), a global technology company focused on making the world safer, greener and more connected, today reported fourth quarter 2024 U.S. GAAP earnings of $1.14 per diluted share. Excluding special items, fourth quarter earnings totaled $1.75 per diluted share.
